question_text_en: What is the time when an agent finds an object whose depth is less than or equal to 0.16m inside the kitchen?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                    { select * where {
                    ?event vh2kg:action ac:find .
                    
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
                        vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxSize ?size .
                    ?size rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?size_z .
                    filter(?size_z <= 0.16)
                
                    } }
                    
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    
                ?event vh2kg:situationAfterEvent ?situation .
                ?state vh2kg:partOf ?situation .
                ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                ?shape vh2kg:inside ?shape2 .
                ?state2 vh2kg:bbox ?shape2 ;
                    vh2kg:isStateOf ?object2 .
                ?object2 rdfs:label "kitchen" .
            
                
                    
                    ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                    ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                    ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?answer .
                
                } limit 1

qualifiers_en.subject: agent
qualifiers_en.object: an object whose depth is less than or equal to 0.16m
qualifiers_en.question: What is the time?

question_text_en: From when to when does an agent write on an object whose attribute is has_paper in the livingroom?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                SELECT DISTINCT ?begin_time ?end_time WHERE {
                    { select * where {
                    ?event vh2kg:action ac:write .
                    
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object vh2kg:attribute vh2kg:has_paper .
            
                    } }
                    
                ?event vh2kg:place ?place .
                ?place rdfs:label "livingroom" .
                
                    
                    ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                    ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                    ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
                    ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                    ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
                
                } limit 1

qualifiers_en.subject: agent
qualifiers_en.object: an object whose attribute is has_paper
qualifiers_en.question: From when to when?

question_text_en: What is the time for an agent that texts an object which is a subclass of Props in the bedroom?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                    { select * where {
                    ?event vh2kg:action ac:text .
                    
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object a ?objectType .
                ?objectType rdfs:subClassOf vh2kg:Props .
            
                    } }
                    
                ?event vh2kg:place ?place .
                ?place rdfs:label "bedroom" .
                
                    
                    ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                    ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                    ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?answer .
                
                } limit 1

qualifiers_en.subject: agent
qualifiers_en.object: an object which is a subclass of Props
qualifiers_en.question: What is the time?

question_text_en: From when to when does an agent turn to an object whose state is OFF at a position where the X coordinate is less than 6.25?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                SELECT DISTINCT ?begin_time ?end_time WHERE {
                    { select * where {
                    ?event vh2kg:action ac:turnTo .
                    
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
                    vh2kg:state vh2kg:OFF .
            
                    } }
                    
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
                    ?pos3d rdf:first ?pos_x .
                    FILTER("6.25"^^xsd:double > ?pos_x)
                
                    
                    
                    ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                    ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                    ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
                    ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                    ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
                
                } limit 1

qualifiers_en.subject: agent
qualifiers_en.space: at a position where the X coordinate is less than 6.25
qualifiers_en.object: an object whose state is OFF
qualifiers_en.question: From when to when?

question_text_en: What is the time for an agent looking at an object whose state is CLEAN at a position where the Z coordinate is greater than -9.33?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                    { select * where {
                    ?event vh2kg:action ac:lookAt .
                    
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
                    vh2kg:state vh2kg:CLEAN .
            
                    } }
                    
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
                    ?pos3d rdf:rest/rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_z .
                    FILTER("-9.33"^^xsd:double < ?pos_z)
                
                    
                    
                    ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                    ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                    ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?answer .
                
                } limit 1

qualifiers_en.subject: agent
qualifiers_en.space: at a position where the Z coordinate is greater than -9.33
qualifiers_en.object: an object whose state is CLEAN
qualifiers_en.question: What is the time?
